Plot: Lucas Hood, an ex-con and master thief, assumes the identity of a murdered sheriff where he continues his criminal activities. His past seems to haunt him by those he betrayed years earlier...
Title: Banshee
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
